text: I enjoyed visiting LiXin a few times this past sem, and the quality is very consistent. The fishballs are soft and tasty, with a light broth. The noodles have a nice texture and the sauce gives it a mild sweet chili flavour. The price is reasonable, and it has a nice interior and usually isn't too busy so it's a good place to dine-in once in a while.

Good bowl of fish ball minced meat noodles at affordable price. Nice ambience, efficient service, comfortable air-con and most importantly good food at affordable prices. Will recommend others to come too!

plant-based noodles (with alliums)
(options that i chose: mee pok, spicy, no ketchup, no spring onion)
glad to find a plant-based option in a fishball noodle restaurant and the taste is good too

there is green onion mixed in all the plant-based fishballs and i think they used shallot oil for the noodles

would be better if its alliums free for more vegetarian patrons

Fishball noodles are good. The fishcakes are very big and the fishballs are nice - not too bouncy and processed. On the pricey side - $7.60 for fishball beehoon soup with fishcake and her giao - but the portion is big. Quiet and empty on a Friday evening.
